T02D3472:122a-3: shes rab 'phel ba'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3472:122a-4: sgron ma tshogs pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02D3472:122a-5: sprul pa'i chu skyes zla dbus son //
T02D3472:122a-6: ham gi yi ge zhu ba yis //
T02D3472:122a-7: dpa' bo nyi ma sbas pas bstan /
T02D3472:122a-9: shes rab lhag par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
T02D3472:122a-10: skad cig gis 'jam dbyangs kyi rnal 'byor du dmigs te /
T02D3472:122a-11: lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3472:122a-12: thig le dkar po la sgron ma tshogs pa'i rnam
T02D3472:122a-13: pa'i 'od zer rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3472:122a-14: spyi bor ham yig dkar po yid gzhom du med
T02D3472:122a-15: pa mgo thur du 'phyang ba'i 'od zer bsgom par
T02D3472:122a-16: bya'o // de'i rjes su thig le'i 'od zer gyis
T02D3472:122a-17: yang dag par bskul nas ham yig zhu bar gyur
T02D3472:122a-18: bya'o // te / de la thig le 'bab cing tshim par bya'o //
T02D3472:122a-19: sems brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas yun ring du mi
T02D3472:122a-20: thogs par shes rab mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro
T02D3472:122a-21: zhes so // lte ba'i steng gi phyogs su ni //
T02D3472:122a-22: dmar zhing gsal ba'i chos 'byung ni //
T02D3472:122a-23: rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa //
T02D3472:122a-25: h'um yig dkar po las skyes pa'i //
T02D3472:122a-26: mgo bo'i mtshams nas nges 'byung ba'i //
T02D3472:122a-27: h'um yig dud kha las byung ba'i ;
T02D3472:122a-28: / sgra yis nam mkha' khyab par blta //
